tool.name: SAGA.table_tools.4
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE_A False isArrayTABLE_B False isArrayID_A False isArrayID_B False isArrayFIELDS False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.table_tools.4 TABLE_A $TABLE_A TABLE_B $TABLE_B ID_A $ID_A ID_B $ID_B FIELDS_ALL $FIELDS_ALL FIELDS $FIELDS KEEP_ALL $KEEP_ALL CMP_CASE $CMP_CASE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: TABLE_A
param.label: Shapes
param.help: Shapes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: TABLE_B
param.label: Join Table
param.help: Join Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ID_A
param.label: Identifier
param.help: Identifier The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ID_B
param.label: Identifier
param.help: Identifier The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELDS
param.label: Fields
param.help: Fields The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RESULT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Joins two tables using key attributes.
